name: Quick-MCP Server
description: A dynamic proxy that converts OpenAPI specifications into MCP tools and resources in real-time

OPENAPI_SPEC_URL.description: URL or path to your OpenAPI specification

BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the API (overrides the one in the spec)

LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level (trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal)

AUTH_HEADERS.description: JSON string of authentication headers to add to all requests
